title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1beta2\LifecycleConfig
name: LifecycleConfig
description:
Specifies the cluster auto-delete schedule configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1beta2.LifecycleConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.idle_delete_ttl
params.description: Optional. The duration to keep the cluster alive while idling. Passing this threshold will cause the cluster to be deleted. Valid range: [10m, 14d]. Example: "10m", the minimum value, to delete the cluster when it has had no jobs running for 10 minutes.

params.name: data.auto_delete_time
params.description: Optional. The time when cluster will be auto-deleted.

params.name: data.auto_delete_ttl
params.description: Optional. The lifetime duration of cluster. The cluster will be auto-deleted at the end of this period. Valid range: [10m, 14d]. Example: "1d", to delete the cluster 1 day after its creation..

methods.name: getIdleDeleteTtl
methods.description:

Passing this threshold will cause the cluster to be deleted. Valid range: [10m, 14d]. Example: "10m", the minimum value, to delete the cluster when it has had no jobs running for 10 minutes.
